action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains four shapes. One is a purple plus sign, one is a pink letter P, one is a pink letter T, and one is a shape made of two orange shapes. The orange shape is a backwards L on top of a rectangle. The green shape is made of three pieces. The top piece is a rectangle, the middle piece is a backwards L, and the bottom piece is a rectangle. The green shape is to the right of the purple plus sign. The pink letter P is to the right of the green shape. The pink letter T is below the pink letter P. The orange shape is below the green shape.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: The image contains a purple plus sign, a green "H" shape, a pink "P" shape, an orange "L" shape, and a pink "T" shape. The shapes are arranged in a way that they form the word "HPLT".

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains four shapes. One is a purple plus sign, one is a pink letter P, one is a pink letter T, and one is a shape made of two orange shapes. The orange shape is a backwards L on top of a rectangle. The green shape is made of three pieces. The top piece is a rectangle, the middle piece is a backwards L, and the bottom piece is a rectangle. The green shape is to the right of the purple plus sign. The pink letter P is to the right of the green shape. The pink letter T is below the pink letter P. The orange shape is below the green shape.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the green shape in your image made of three pieces, or is it a single piece?

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains a purple plus sign, a green "H" shape, a pink "P" shape, an orange "L" shape, and a pink "T" shape. The shapes are arranged in a way that they form the word "HPLT".
QUESTION: Is the green shape in your image made of three pieces, or is it a single piece? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the orange shape in your image a single piece, or is it made of two pieces?

ANSWER: Three pieces.
QUESTION: Is the orange shape in your image a single piece, or is it made of two pieces? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: Two pieces.
